title: Bheeshma Parvam Movie Promotion Event Video
description: As part of the promotional campaign for the 'Bheeshma Parvam' movie, I had the opportunity to create a video documenting an engaging event held at my college. This event brought together students, faculty, and film enthusiasts to celebrate the filmâ€™s themes and its talented cast.

title: Nightmare Short Video
description: In the creation of the 'Nightmare' short video, I aimed to evoke a sense of suspense and intrigue through visual storytelling. The project involved developing a compelling narrative that explored the themes of fear and uncertainty, capturing the essence of a nightmare experience.

title: Chat Website
description: With the release of the OpenAI GPT Store, I decided to build a SaaS which allows users to collect email addresses from their GPT users. This is a great way to build an audience and monetize your GPT API usage.
